org.mini2Dx.core.collisions

Class PointQuadTree<T extends Positionable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.math.Rectangle
      • org.mini2Dx.core.geom.Rectangle
        • org.mini2Dx.core.collisions.PointQuadTree<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.math.Shape2D, java.io.Serializable, QuadTree<T>, PositionChangeListener<T>, Parallelogram, Shape
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RegionQuadTree

    public class PointQuadTree<T extends Positionable>
extends Rectangle
implements QuadTree<T>
    Implements a point quadtree
    See Also:
    Wikipedia: Point Quad Tree, Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • PointQuadTree

        public PointQuadTree(int elementLimitPerQuad,
             int mergeWatermark,
             float x,
             float y,
             float width,
             float height)
        Constructs a PointQuadTree with a specified element limit and watermark
        Parameters:
        elementLimitPerQuad - The maximum number of elements in a quad before it is split into 4 child PointQuadTrees
        mergeWatermark - When a parent PointQuadTree's total elements go lower than this mark, the child PointQuadTrees will be merged back together
        x - The x coordinate of the PointQuadTree
        y - The y coordiante of the PointQuadTree
        width - The width of the PointQuadTree
        height - The height of the PointQuadTree

      • PointQuadTree

        public PointQuadTree(int elementLimitPerQuad,
             float x,
             float y,
             float width,
             float height)
        Constructs a PointQuadTree with a specified element limit and no merging watermark. As elements are removed, small sized child PointQuadTrees will not be merged back together.
        Parameters:
        elementLimitPerQuad - The maximum number of elements in a quad before it is split into 4 child PointQuadTrees
        x - The x coordinate of the PointQuadTree
        y - The y coordiante of the PointQuadTree
        width - The width of the PointQuadTree
        height - The height of the PointQuadTree

      • PointQuadTree

        public PointQuadTree(PointQuadTree<T> parent,
             float x,
             float y,
             float width,
             float height)
        Constructs a PointQuadTree as a child of another PointQuadTree
        Parameters:
        parent - The parent PointQuadTree
        x - The x coordinate of the PointQuadTree
        y - The y coordiante of the PointQuadTree
        width - The width of the PointQuadTree
        height - The height of the PointQuadTree
